original_text: But the people, the men of Israel, took courage, and again formed the battle line in the same place where they had formed it on the first day.
korean_text: 이스라엘 사람들이 스스로 용기를 내어 첫날 전열을 갖추었던 곳에서 다시 전열을 갖추니라

sentences.original_text: But the people, the men of Israel,
and again formed the battle line
in the same place where they had formed it on the first day.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 ��날에 전열을 갖추었던 그 같은 곳에.
